00062 
00063 inline const Equation_base& Assembleur_P_EF::equation() const
00064 {
00065   if (mon_equation.non_nul()==0)
00066     {
00067       Cerr << "\nError in Assembleur_P_EF::equation() : The equation is unknown !" << finl;
00068       Process::exit();
00069     }
00070   return  mon_equation.valeur();
00071 }
